thread.title: Majestic Wine appoints DIY specialist as MD

title: Majestic Wine appoints DIY specialist as MD
text:
25 Sep 2015 | By Edward Devlin , Adam Leyland 
Majestic Wine has appointed a new managing director to head up the Majestic store network, The Grocer has learned Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages. 
If you need to talk to our Customer Services team, please call 0800 652 6512 and we'll be happy to help. You're not logged in...already a member?
